title: Monogram fine tuning
content:
Hi All,

I've been work on this personal monogram, with the initials TCVW.  
Do you think it can be improved? and how? I'm not sure if the serifs are right, but I've been looking at it too long…!

Any advice is much appreciated

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo-01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205243/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-01.jpg) | 49.85 KB |
author: toby1

comments.content:
I like it. Have you tried to extend |T|’s serifs above the crossbar?  
And I think |C|’s and |T|’s serif should either be aligned or moved further away from each other.

Thanks Riccardo,

I tried extending the 'T' serifs, not sure if i liked that. I can see what you mean with the 'C' and 'T', i'll bring the 'C' serif in a bit further towards the 'W' and away from the 'T'

Cheers
